subscriptionCheck.title: Subscription Check
subscriptionCheck.message: No active subscription found on this Apple ID. Please sign in with the Apple ID used for purchase.
subscriptionCheck.howToFixMessage:
1. Go to Settings → App Store
2. Sign in with the Apple ID used for purchase
3. Return to Clever and tap the PRO badge again

proStatusCheck.title: Pro Status Check
proStatusCheck.message: Unable to verify subscription status. Please try again or check your internet connection.
